item.title: Why Apple added yet another button to the iPhone 16
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
Apple giveth and taketh away — particularly when it comes to ports and buttons. The company has long taken a “less is more” approach to any detail that might disrupt its devices’ feng shui. The company is feeling a lot more bullish about buttons these days. After introducing the Action Button on the Apple Watch […]

item.title: Audible recruits voice actors to train audiobook-generating AI
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Audible, Amazon’s audiobook business, on Monday announced that it’ll use AI trained on professional narrators’ voices to generate new audiobook recordings. A select, U.S.-based cohort of audiobook narrators will be invited to train AI on their voices starting this week, Audible said. The trained AI will be used to make recordings, and narrators will have […]

item.title: Climate change was a lot less prominent in this year’s iPhone event
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description:
The lack of climate announcement's at Apple's annual event shows just how hard meaningful progress on carbon emissions can be, even for one of the world’s most valuable companies.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: iPhone 16, Apple Intelligence, AirPods 4 and more: Live updates on everything revealed at Apple Event 2024
item.dc:creator: Morgan Little
item.description:
Apple's lineup of announcements echoed many of the anticipated hardware reveals, including the new iPhone 16, AirPods 4, the Apple Watch Series 10 and more.

item.title: Confluent acquires streaming data startup WarpStream
item.dc:creator: Frederic Lardinois
item.description:
Confluent plans to use WarpStream's cloud-native solution to fill out its portfolio by offering a new service (Confluent WarpStream) that can sit in between its fully-managed Confluent Cloud and self-managed Confluent Platform.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Apple sets lower iPhone 16 Pro prices in India
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Apple will sell the just launched iPhone 16 Pro lineup in India at prices approximately 15,000 rupees ($178) lower than its predecessor’s launch prices, as it extends the benefits from reduced import duties and expanding local manufacturing to consumers. The iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max models now start at 119,900 rupees ($1,428) and 144,900 […]

item.description:
iOS 18 will be available in the fall as a free software update.

item.title: All the iPhone 16 models compared
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
All the iPhones now have an action button and a dedicated camera button.

item.title: What is Apple Intelligence, when is it coming and who will get it?
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
Apple Intelligence was designed to leverage things that generative AI already does well, like text and image generation, to improve upon existing features.

item.title: Here’s the full list of 35 US AI startups that have raised $100M or more in 2024

item.description:
In the first half of 2024 alone, more than $35.5 billion was invested into AI startups globally.

item.title: Apple will make iOS 18 available to all users on September 16
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
You will get the iOS 18 update if you have an iPhone XR or later, or iPhone SE (second gen) or later.

item.title: Apple to release AI-focused macOS Sequoia on September 16
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
The swift macOS Sequoia release deviates from Apple's usual late September or October timeline for desktop OS updates.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Apple’s Voice Memos app will soon let you layer vocals on top of music
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
When the upgraded Voice Memos app rolls out, you'll be able to sing over a track you recorded earlier — a guitar track, say — by tapping on a new "layer" button before you hit record.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: With Apple Intelligence, iPhone users will finally get a better Siri
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
While consumers won't get the full impact of the Siri upgrade until Apple Intelligence launches, Apple promises it will upend the user experience

item.title: Apple’s iPhone 16 Pro models arrive with 6.3- and 6.9-inch displays, larger battery and new A18 Pro chip
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
The 16 Pro starts at $999, while the Pro Max runs $1,119 and up. Preorder opens Friday. The handsets start shipping on September 20.

item.title: AI-powered visual search comes to the iPhone

item.description:
Visual intelligence will launch along with other Apple Intelligence features in beta in October for U.S. English language users.

item.title: Apple adds a dedicated camera button on iPhone 16
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Pressing the button for the first time will open the camera app. You press it to take a photo and press and hold to start a video recording.

item.title: Apple announces its new A18 and A18 Pro iPhone chips
item.dc:creator: Frederic Lardinois
item.description:
To nobody’s surprise, Apple today debuted its A18 system-on-a-chip, the successor to the A17 Pro chip it announced at its last iPhone event. If you recall, at that time, Apple only announced an A17 Pro, which was featured in the iPhone Pro and Pro Max models, leaving some to speculate that a regular A17 chip […]

item.title: Apple updates AirPods Max headphones with a USB-C port and new colors
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
Apple released a new version of its premium over-the-ear headphones, AirPods Max, on Monday during its 2024 Apple Event. The revamp replaces the AirPods Max’s lightning port with a USB-C port, and comes in five new colors: midnight, blue, purple, orange, and starlight. The updated version of Apple’s AirPods Max are still $549, and can […]

item.title: Apple’s iPhone 16 arrives with AI features and devoted camera button, starting at $799
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
Apple Intelligence was the star of this show, as the new iPhone 16 line joins last year's iPhone 15 Pro models as the only members of the line that can run run the company's new small model offering.
